Lyric:
[00:25.22]whenever i step outside,
[00:27.49]somebody claims to see the light
[00:30.30]it seems to me
[00:31.27]that all of us have lost our patience
[00:35.11]'cause everyone thinks they're right,
[00:38.71]and nobody thinks that there just might
[00:41.40]be more than one road to our final destination
[00:46.43]but i'm not ever going to know
[00:50.88]if i'm right or wrong
[00:53.65]'cause we're all going in the same direction
[00:57.25]
[00:57.89]and i'm not sure which way to go
[01:02.20]because all along
[01:04.77]we've been goin in the same direction
[01:08.83]
[01:10.04]i'm tired of playing games,
[01:13.04]of looking for someone else to blame
[01:15.39]for all the holes in answers that are clearly showing
[01:20.66]for something to fill the space,
[01:24.08]was all of the time i spent a waste
[01:26.88]'cause so many choices point the same way i was going
[01:31.89]but i'm not ever going to know
[01:36.30]if i'm right or wrong
[01:39.00]'cause we're all going in the same direction
[01:42.99]and i'm not sure which way to go
[01:47.66]because all along
[01:50.29]we've been goin in the same direction
[01:53.97]going in the same direction
[01:56.88]
[02:01.12]same direction
[02:04.12]same direction
[02:08.11]
[02:08.74]so why does there only have
[02:11.12]to be one correct philosophy?
[02:14.45]i don't want to go and follow you
[02:17.04]just to end up like one of them
[02:19.85]and why are you always telling me
[02:22.97]what you want me to believe?
[02:25.82]i'd like to think that i can go my own way
[02:28.77]and meet you in the end
[02:30.71]go my own way and meet you in the end
[02:34.61]but i'm not ever going to know
[02:38.94]if i'm right or wrong
[02:41.45]'cause we're all going in the same direction

[02:49.88]because all along
